Divers√£o co-op garantida h√° anos! Nunca fica ruim essa simples premissa... grupo de sobreviventes contra zumbis com mec√¢nicas simples e veloz. Jogos assim, sem florear e inventar demais, atravessam gera√ß√µes sem perder o gosto. Muito recomendado!
###############
Co-op fun guaranteed for years! This simple premise never gets bad... group of survivors against zombies with simple and fast mechanics. Games like this, without flourishing and inventing too much, cross generations without losing their taste. Highly recommended!
